arts.ttl: Samir Nasri denies being linked with Jorge Sampaoli’s coaching staff at Rennes
arts.sum: Samir Nasri strongly denied on Sunday to Canal+ – where he works as a pundit – that he would join Jorge Sampaoli’s coaching staff at Rennes as a deputy coach.…

arts.ttl: Rennes predicted XI v Toulouse: Jota and Arnaud Kalimuendo to start as Sébastien Tambouret takes interim charge
arts.sum: Julien Stéphan was relieved of his duties earlier this week. The arrival of former Olympique de Marseille manager Jorge Sampaoli is imminent, however, he will not be appointed before Stade…
